item.title: Holmes Beach installs school speed zone cameras for the first time
item.description: Chief William Tokajer said the city implemented the speed cameras because people have been caught going well beyond the city’s max speed limit of 25 mph and the school speed zone of 15 mph.

item.title: ABC7 talks with Sarasota County Schools Superintendent Terry Connor
item.description: ABC7 talks with Sarasota County Schools Superintendent Terry Connor

item.title: Lightning blamed for boat fire in Englewood
item.description: Lightning blamed for boat fire in Englewood

item.title: Medical team at Nathan Benderson Park reunites with man who had heart attack while competing
item.description: The father of four spent two and a half weeks recovering in the hospital.

item.title: Emergency recordings and videos detail the chaotic rescue efforts during the deadly Texas floods
item.description: The flooding killed at least 136 people — including more than two dozen children and counselors at Camp Mystic.

item.title: Sandbag stations opening again in Sarasota County
item.description: The county is offering free, voluntary, self-service sandbag locations Aug. 10.

item.title: Lightning causes boat fire in Englewood
item.description: The boat was parked in a storage lot off Englewood Road.

item.title: Another warm, humid and stormy day in the forecast
Boar’s Head plans to reopen troubled deli meat plant, but reports of sanitation problems persist
item.description: The Boar's Head deli meat plant at the heart of a deadly food poisoning outbreak is set to reopen in the coming months.

item.title: Florida farm identified as source of raw milk that sickened 21
item.description: The Florida Department of Health has identified Keely Farms Dairy as the source of raw milk that has sickened 21 people.

item.title: Excessive rainfall possible this weekend
item.description: High rain chances continue through the weekend, while odds of tropical development are dropping.

item.title: Accused accessory in Battie murder case withdraws request to lower bond
item.description: Nicole Roberts is accused of helping her boyfriend dispose of the murder weapon.

item.title: Meet Johnny, ABC7’s Pet of the Week
item.description: Johnny is a sweet 11-month-old Cocker Spaniel ready to find his forever home.
